## [A Jupyter + R ( + mybinder.org) tutorial for social scientists](https://github.com/InfantLab/NotebookDemos)

By [The Infant Lab](https://github.com/InfantLab/NotebookDemos)

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from repo:** This repository contains a Jupyter notebook file which walks you through the basics of using notebooks and RStats for reproducible data analysis.
It starts with a general guide to the notebook format and how to install the necessary software.
Then it goes through an example using R to load data, filter missing values, create graphs and run statistical tests.

1.  Link to repo here: https://github.com/InfantLab/NotebookDemos
